thread.title: Effingham Fair opens Monday with parade
thread.title_full: Effingham Fair opens Monday with parade | savannahnow.com

author: Effingham Now
title: Effingham Fair opens Monday with parade
text:
Photos File Photo/ Effingham Fair 2014 By Effingham Now The annual Effingham County Fair opens Monday, Oct. 19 with a parade at 5 p.m.
Theme for this year’s fair is “A Carnival of Products.”
The parade route is through downtown Springfield on Laurel Street, ending at the fairgrounds.
The fair runs all week, ending on Oct. 24.
Gates for the fair open each night at 5 p.m. with no admission fee on Monday.
Tickets for all you can ride are $15 on Monday and Wednesday. Special ride pricing is available all week.
Admission is $5, under age 6 is free. For a full list of ride pricing and fair entertainment, visit. www.effingahmfair.org.
